name: USER_NAME_FIRST_MIN
description:
/**
 * Represents the minimum length allowed for the user's first name.
 *
 * This limit ensures that first names are meaningful and have enough characters for proper identification.
 */

name: USER_NAME_FIRST_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for the user's first name.
 *
 * This limit ensures that first names are not overly long, which could impact database storage and UI design.
 */
